prompt:
üéØ MATRIX NEGOTIATION - Token Strategist (Round 1)

üè¶ IMPORTANT: TWO DIFFERENT CURRENCIES
üí∞ TOKENS: The actual payout (600 total tokens in the prize pool)
üó≥Ô∏è VOTES: The negotiation currency used to decide which proposal wins

MATRIX STRUCTURE (16 columns):
üí∞ PROPOSAL (cols 0-3): % of TOKEN POOL each player gets (MUST sum to 100)
üó≥Ô∏è VOTING (cols 4-7): % of YOUR VOTES for each proposal (MUST sum to 100)
ü§ù VOTE OFFERS (cols 8-11): VOTES you promise to give each player (0-100)
üìû VOTE REQUESTS (cols 12-15): VOTES you want from each player (0-100)

PLAYERS: 0: Token Strategist ‚Üê YOU, 1: Vote Trader, 2: Alliance Builder, 3: Sharp Negotiator

üö® CRITICAL UNDERSTANDING:
- PROPOSAL = "If this proposal wins, Player X gets Y% of the 600 token prize pool"
- VOTING = "I give X% of my votes to support Proposal Y" 
- VOTE OFFERS = "I promise to give X votes to Player Y (to build alliances)"
- VOTE REQUESTS = "I want X votes from Player Y (to strengthen my position)"

üö® MATH RULES:
- Proposal section MUST sum to exactly 100 (token percentages)
- Voting section MUST sum to exactly 100 (your vote allocation)
- Your self-allocation (position 0) must be ‚â•17% (tokens, not votes)
- Vote offers/requests are individual numbers (not percentages)

CURRENT MATRIX STATE:
Row 0 (Token Strategist): Tokens[0,0,0,0%] Votes[0,0,0,0%] Offers[0,0,0,0] Requests[0,0,0,0]
Row 1 (Vote Trader): Tokens[0,0,0,0%] Votes[0,0,0,0%] Offers[0,0,0,0] Requests[0,0,0,0]
Row 2 (Alliance Builder): Tokens[0,0,0,0%] Votes[0,0,0,0%] Offers[0,0,0,0] Requests[0,0,0,0]
Row 3 (Sharp Negotiator): Tokens[0,0,0,0%] Votes[0,0,0,0%] Offers[0,0,0,0] Requests[0,0,0,0]

YOUR STRATEGY: "Focus on maximizing token percentages while using vote trading strategically"

EXAMPLES of strategic thinking:
- "Player 2 is offering me 50 votes but only giving me 15% tokens - bad deal!"
- "I'll offer 30 votes to Player 1 because they gave me 25% in their proposal"
- "Player 3 requests 60 votes from me but offers only 10 votes back - greedy!"

REQUIRED RESPONSE FORMAT:
{
  "explanation": "I analyzed the matrix and saw [token/vote observations]. I'm changing [specific changes] because [reasoning about token payouts vs vote trading]. My goal is [strategic objective].",
  "matrixRow": [num,num,num,num,num,num,num,num,num,num,num,num,num,num,num,num]
}
